Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

AccessRules.description: An object that sets the public accessibility of objects in the specified bucket.

properties.name: GetObject
properties.description: Specifies the anonymous access to all objects in a bucket.

type.description: Specifies the anonymous access to all objects in a bucket.

properties.name: AllowPublicOverrides
properties.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the access control list (ACL) permissions that are applied to individual objects override the getObject option that is currently specified.

type.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the access control list (ACL) permissions that are applied to individual objects override the getObject option that is currently specified.

properties.name: BundleId
properties.description: The ID of the bundle to use for the bucket.

type.description: The ID of the bundle to use for the bucket.

properties.name: ObjectVersioning
properties.description: Specifies whether to enable or disable versioning of objects in the bucket.

type.description: Specifies whether to enable or disable versioning of objects in the bucket.

properties.name: ResourcesReceivingAccess
properties.description: The names of the Lightsail resources for which to set bucket access.

type.description: The names of the Lightsail resources for which to set bucket access.

properties.name: ReadOnlyAccessAccounts
properties.description: An array of strings to specify the AWS account IDs that can access the bucket.

type.description: An array of strings to specify the AWS account IDs that can access the bucket.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: AbleToUpdateBundle
properties.description: Indicates whether the bundle that is currently applied to a bucket can be changed to another bundle. You can update a bucket's bundle only one time within a monthly AWS billing cycle.

type.description: Indicates whether the bundle that is currently applied to a bucket can be changed to another bundle. You can update a bucket's bundle only one time within a monthly AWS billing cycle.
